title: PM felicitates nation on Shab-e-Barat
content:
In a tweet on social media platform Twitter, he said, “Shab-e-Barat Mubarak to the nation and the Muslim Ummah. May Allah Almighty have mercy on us and bring us peace and prosperity. Ameen!”
He also wished the Hindu community a very happy Holi, the festival of colours.
Minister for Foreign Affairs Shah Mahmood Qureshi also congratulated Muslims on Shab-e-Barat.
He also felicitated the Hindu community on the occasion of Holi festival.
